sourcesContent:
import styles from './cart.module.scss' import store from 'store' import { MouseEvent, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Modal from 'components/Modal' import TopNavBar from 'components/TopNavBar' import { useRecoil } from 'hooks/state' import { cartStoreState } from 'states/cartStoreState' interface SearchStructure { authors: string[] contents: string datetime: string isbn: string price: number publisher: string sale_price: number status: string thumbnail: string title: string translators: any[] url: string } const Cart = () => { const storeData = store.get('cartStore') const [cartStoreData, setCartStoreData] = useRecoil(cartStoreState) const price = storeData .map((item: SearchStructure) => item.price) .reduce((prev: number, curr: number) => prev + curr, 0) const handleClick = (e: MouseEvent) => { const { value } = e.currentTarget.dataset const { className } = e.currentTarget if (className.split('_')[1] === 'deleteBtn') { store.set( 'cartStore', cartStoreData.filter((item: SearchStructure) => item.isbn !== value) ) setCartStoreData(store.get('cartStore')) } } useEffect(() => { console.log(cartStoreData) }, [cartStoreData]) return (
    {cartStoreData.map((item: SearchStructure) => (
  • {item.title}
    {item.authors}
    {item.price}원
    • ))}
  • 총 상품 수
    {cartStoreData.length}개
  • 총 상품 금액
    {price}원
  • 총 배송비
    얼마
  • 총 결제 예상 금액
    {price}원
{/* */}
) } export default Cart
